title: Website login issue
description: Customer is unable to log in to their account. They have tried resetting the password but it's not working.

title: Payment gateway error
description: Users are receiving a 'Transaction failed' error when attempting to make a purchase.

title: Feature request: Dark mode
description: Customer would like to see a dark mode option for the application to reduce eye strain.

title: Report generation is slow
description: The weekly sales report is taking an unusually long time to generate. It's causing delays for the sales team.

title: Account verification link expired
description: Customer created an account but the verification link sent via email has expired. They need a new one.

title: Incorrect product pricing
description: The price for product 'XYZ' on the website is different from the price in the backend system.

title: Mobile app crashes on startup
description: The mobile application is crashing immediately after being opened on multiple Android devices.

title: Missing order history
description: Customer's order history is not visible in their account. They need to see a list of their past purchases.

title: Email notification not received
description: Customer did not receive the order confirmation email after a successful purchase.

title: Website search functionality broken
description: The search bar on the website is not returning any results, even for known products.

title: Password reset email not sending
description: When a customer requests a password reset, the email is not being sent.

title: Confusing checkout process
description: Customer found the checkout process to be overly complicated and difficult to complete.
